text: John Fredrick Stoddart (22 September 1805 29 August 1839) was a Puisne Justice of the Supreme Court of Ceylon. Stoddart was the son of John Stoddart, Chief Justice of Malta. ==References== ===Citations=== ===Bibliography=== * Category:Puisne Justices of the Supreme Court of Ceylon Category:British expatriates in Sri Lanka Category:Sri Lankan people of Maltese descent Category:19th-century British people Category:1805 births Category:1839 deaths
title: John Fredrick Stoddart
